name: Master of None
description:
A summoner game but your minions serve no one! Use your minions to try take down enemies while they also try to attack you and each other. 

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Space bar to summon minion

1, 2 and 3 keys to change minion type

Objective:

Use you summons to attack enemies and get point. Try not to get touched by any of the slimes so you don't die.

Have Fun!
